name: Power from abyss
description:
Controls:

Keyboard

Arrow keys -  move

Z- shoots

Spacebar - jumps

Controllers also enabled

Square, X - attack

Corss, A - jumps

this is my first game jam project. Collect all the gems while keeping an eye on your battery timer.
